mapper.insert: insert into alipay_medium (mediumNumber, mediumId, mediumHolder, mediumPhone, qrcodeId, code, createTime, submitTime, status, isDeal, mediumNote,attr) values (#{mediumNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediumId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediumHolder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediumPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeal,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mediumNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{attr})

mediumHolder = #{mediumHolder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

submitTime = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mountSystem = #{mountSystem,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update alipay_medium set mediumHolder = #{mediumHolder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mediumPhone = #{mediumPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrcodeId = #{qrcodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr = #{attr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, submitTime = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isDeal = #{isDeal,jdbcType=CHAR}, mediumNote = #{mediumNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, mediumNumber = #{mediumNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update alipay_medium set mediumHolder = #{mediumHolder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mediumPhone = #{mediumPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrcodeId = #{qrcodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr = #{attr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, submitTime = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isDeal = #{isDeal,jdbcType=CHAR}, mediumNumber = #{mediumNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: (SELECT (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT("",fixationAmount,"元") AS fixation FROM alipay_file_list t2 WHERE t2.`concealId` = m.`mediumId` AND t2.isDeal = '2') AS fixation, m.mediumNumber as mediumNumber, m.mediumHolder as mediumHolder, m.mediumPhone as mediumPhone, m.qrcodeId as qrcodeId, m.status as status, m.id as id FROM alipay_medium m WHERE m.isDeal = '2' AND m.status = 1 AND m.`qrcodeId` = #{accountId} ORDER BY m.id DESC LIMIT 9999999) UNION (SELECT (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT("",fixationAmount,"元") AS fixation FROM alipay_file_list t2 WHERE t2.`concealId` = m.`mediumId` AND t2.isDeal = '2') AS fixation, m.mediumNumber as mediumNumber, m.mediumHolder as mediumHolder, m.mediumPhone as mediumPhone, m.qrcodeId as qrcodeId, m.status as status, m.id as id FROM alipay_medium m WHERE m.isDeal = '2' AND m.status = 0 AND m.`qrcodeId` = #{accountId} ORDER BY m.id DESC LIMIT 9999999)

SELECT id, mediumNumber, mediumId, mediumHolder,mediumNote, mediumPhone, qrcodeId, code, createTime, submitTime, status, isDeal,attr,bankcode,account,mountNow,mountSystem,mountLimit,notfiyMask FROM alipay_medium WHERE isDeal = '2' AND `qrcodeId` = #{accountId} ORDER BY id DESC
